# copy()

**Instance Method**

Returns a copy of the camera zoom region.

## Declaration

```swift
copy(): CameraZoomRange;
```

## Return Value

A [doc://com.apple.mapkitjs/documentation/MapKitJS/CameraZoomRange] object that is a copy of the original.
title: copy()
